title: This activity tests you on how to create, use an array as an object in function which in turn should return an array as the return value in the function.

questionText.text:
Given an array of ints with length 3, return a new array with the elements in reverse order, so {1, 2, 3} becomes {3, 2, 1}.
reverse3([1, 2, 3]) → [3, 2, 1]
reverse3([5, 11, 9]) → [9, 11, 5]
reverse3([7, 0, 0]) → [0, 0, 7]

sameFirstLast([1, 2, 1]) → true
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
